translations: v.<旧>（尤指蛇）以眼神震慑（人，动物），使无法动弹；深深吸引，迷住

phrs.translation: 强烈的吸引, 吸引, 迷住, 使
迷住, 使着迷, 使神魂颠倒, 吸引住

sentences.sentence: Angels fascinate, as Christmas-card-makers rediscover every year.
sentences.translation: 天使令人着迷，正如圣诞卡制造商们每年一再发现的那样。

sentences.sentence: The private lives of movie stars never fail to fascinate.
sentences.translation: 电影明星的私生活总为人所津津乐道。

sentences.sentence: These renegades, cerebral experiments fascinate many of his peers.
sentences.translation: 这些叛逆的、理性的实验吸引了他的许多同行。
